New York City is bracing for a winter storm with a snow alert and travel advisory, while security measures are heightened at churches following recent incidents; additionally, a controversial sale of rent-stabilized apartments has been approved despite objections from city officials.

### Risks & Alerts

- Snow alert and travel advisory issued for NYC ahead of Sunday’s winter storm. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiwwFBVV95cUxNVVZpak01dEVPRWEzd3FEd3ZPWFFncU4xeXhmcFJfc2xCRW1ZSktFNUVoRzU0Rlp1cHByOWNCa3FLclRLcTV6TEFwMC11Um51UFF4NHBydjVRZTdicUFMWmRiZlFUM1NKaGdxZzVSeTkxUEw4QmRYek1QVE1YZ0FGTkduZnFtQVNaSDhPNTNKdUtha2IxVTBKRHY2QTNEVFFCaGFrR3lwa1RUVG55ZVhOMG1ia2VXeDg3LV9UMVd6RlVNUm_SAcgBQVVfeXFMT3dKcEFQZElBQlBBR1NEaVNLU0pDSWVuRFNXUzBzcVdZUTZVQ0FWZDRONDZxc2VHcVgyLXhZb0t1S3dfanNMMWdGQ0ZGa1JmR2prNkdNbHZZUm4zdFo1cHBFazFyc1FvSUt5MDBIc21RUHZxaWRINi0wanU5bDU5aTRyOFJvdFl4MnowdEVNQVgtYTJndUpUbWtDZTQ5aG5uMFF4dVNiZnRsdVo3bTBSekJGd0xucWFqczNmYW9TbEJENXFNenc3ZGE?oc=5)
- Several buildings and cars engulfed in flames in a Yonkers fire; no injuries reported. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYPD increasing security at churches on Staten Island following recent incidents across the borough. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Snowfall totals expected from winter storm on January 16, affecting NYC, NY, NJ, and CT. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics
